item.description:
Freedom is Fundamental Book Club and Discussion Group is pleased to present: 

"What is Money?" with Joseph T. Salerno

Representative Ron Paul sponsored this Congressional lecture on "What is Money?", part one of a three part series on the basic principles of money for Congressional staff. As a continuing educational tool this lecture was filmed and is provided to the public.

Joseph T. Salerno, Ph.D., delivered the lecture. He is academic vice president of the Mises Institute, professor of economics at Pace University, and editor of the Quarterly Journal of Austrian Economics.

pssst....if you went through the US education system you probably have no clue as to what Money really is. Come to this meetUp to find out what  1% of the population (or the people that manage their money) know that the other 99% doesn't.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: !!!!! MONEY !!!!!
